Summary: observed what looked like a star darting around then disappeared into horizon. was above my house. a few nights later son asked me to look at something and saw light through the trees pulsating different colors above. ballfield by my house about 400 ft.
divs: Sighting DetailsSecond event was pulsating light a few days later. Was above ball field about 400 ft. From my house.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
